content: I'm planning to use the data logger primarily for improving my performance on the track, but I also think it would be useful for analyzing my driving on scenic roads or during spirited drives. I've heard that some data loggers can provide insights into my daily driving habits, which could help me become a more efficient and safe driver. Would a data logger like the Garmin Catalyst be able to provide this type of information, or is that more of a feature found in high-end systems?
